public class TankRonaldo extends robocode.AdvancedRobot
TankRonaldo - a Robocode Robot created for the ASW course.

  • Constructor Details

    • TankRonaldo

      public TankRonaldo()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      TankRonaldo's default behavior in each round. The radar is set to turn independently of the gun. The gun is set to turn independently of the body. Radar continuously scans for enemies in all directions.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class robocode.Robot

    • onScannedRobot

      public void onScannedRobot(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent enemy)
      Actions taken when another Robot is detected by the radar actioned in the run() method. Executes the queued up standard sequences of radar rotation, body movement, gun engagement.
      Specified by:
      onScannedRobot in interface robocode.robotinterfaces.IBasicEvents
      Overrides:
      onScannedRobot in class robocode.Robot
      Parameters:
      enemy - information about the most recently scanned enemy Robot on the battlefield

    • doRadar

      public void doRadar(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent enemy)
      Describes the radar behavior. Oscillates 30 degrees in the detected enemy's direction, then reverses the orientation.
      Parameters:
      enemy - Robot captured by the onScannedRobot(ScannedRobotEvent) method

    • doMove

      public void doMove(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent enemy)
      Describes the movement behavior. Turns Robot's body almost perpendicular to the enemy, allowing to move towards it. Strafes and closes in by changing direction every 20 ticks. Also inverts direction upon collision with a wall or another Robot.
      Parameters:
      enemy - Robot captured by the onScannedRobot(ScannedRobotEvent) method

    • doGun

      public void doGun(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent enemy)
      Describes the gun behavior. Turns gun to the position determined by the getOptimalGunAngle(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent) method. Adjusts firepower based on enemy proximity. Fires if the gun is cool and pointed at the target within a reasonable margin.
      Parameters:
      enemy - Robot captured by the onScannedRobot(ScannedRobotEvent) method

    • onWin

      public void onWin(robocode.WinEvent victory)
      Victory dance performed by the Robot in case of winning a round of a battle.
      Specified by:
      onWin in interface robocode.robotinterfaces.IBasicEvents
      Overrides:
      onWin in class robocode.Robot
      Parameters:
      victory - round win captured by onWin(WinEvent)
